rows.label: qst650404_msg0001
rows.name: I really am so, so sorry...

rows.label: qst650404_msg0002
rows.name:
I just couldn't stand the thought
of the children getting hurt,
so I sorta rushed in...

rows.label: qst650404_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, while I do think that kindness
and passion are some of your best
qualities, Hibana, it was, uh...

rows.label: qst650404_msg0004
rows.name:
What Rex is trying to say is, you gotta
think of the consequences. We had a chance
to save the kids, and we blew it.

rows.label: qst650404_msg0005
rows.name:
I know, I know... I'll
reflect on my behavior...

rows.label: qst650404_msg0006
rows.name:
Ah, don't beat yourself up. We'll
get 'em next time for sure.

rows.label: qst650404_msg0007
rows.name: But we will have to find them first...

rows.label: qst650404_msg0009
rows.name:
They looked like they were
headed for the Lud Cloudway...

rows.label: qst650404_msg0011
rows.name:
We will have to conduct
a thorough search.

rows.label: qst650404_msg0012
rows.name: Right! And we'd better get started NOW!

rows.label: qst650404_msg0013
rows.name:
...Uh, I mean, slow and steady!
Yep, slooooow and steady...
Breathe, Hibana, breathe...

rows.label: qst650404_msg0014
rows.name: This'll end in tears, won't it?
